verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: rustic] [ARG1: fruit] [V: tart] my husband and i love pie but we ca n't eat a whole 9-inch pie by ourselves so i make these easy tarts using rhubarb and raspberries picked at home sometimes i substitute apples peaches or our garden blueberries for the rhubarb —naomi olson hamilton michigan
